title: Srimad Bhagavatam I Srila Prabhupada I SB 1. 2 .5 I 27.11.2023
speaker: HDG Srila Prabhupada

segments.key_quote: So here it is recommended that simply by inquiring about Kṛṣṇa and taking answer of the question, both the questioner and the answer-giver, both will be pleased.
segments.summary: Engaging in Kṛṣṇa-kathā, questioning and answering about Kṛṣṇa, brings peacefulness and relief from the blazing fire of the world.

segments.key_quote: It is simply questioning about Kṛṣṇa and hearing the answer.
segments.summary: Inquiring about Kṛṣṇa is a pious activity that leads to auspiciousness and the re-establishment of religious principles.

segments.key_quote: Without any doubt, our liberation is guaranteed simply by hearing about Kṛṣṇa.
segments.summary: Hearing about Kṛṣṇa's attractive qualities and activities guarantees liberation, as Kṛṣṇa comes to re-establish religious principles.

themes: Kṛṣṇa as the ultimate Absolute Truth
segments.key_quote: The ultimate Absolute Truth is Kṛṣṇa, the person.
segments.summary: The human form of life is meant for inquiring about the Absolute Truth, with Kṛṣṇa being the ultimate Absolute Truth, surpassing the understanding of Paramātmā and brahma effulgence.

segments.key_quote: They are satisfied in any condition life, provided they have got the opportunity to serve Kṛṣṇa.
segments.summary: Devotees are distinct from jñānīs and yogis, finding satisfaction in serving Kṛṣṇa in any condition of life.

segments.key_quote: So the conclusion is when we forget Kṛṣṇa, that is materialistic.
segments.summary: The distinction between spiritual and material lies in remembering or forgetting Kṛṣṇa, with actions performed for Kṛṣṇa's satisfaction being spiritual.
Materialism is driven by sense gratification and the desire for proprietorship, stemming from forgetfulness of Kṛṣṇa, who is the source of everything.

segments.key_quote: That will solve all social problems.
segments.summary: Introducing Kṛṣṇa consciousness into family life through acca-vigraha-seva can solve social problems by centering activities around Kṛṣṇa.

segments.key_quote: So without being Kṛṣṇa conscious, there is no end of social problems.
segments.summary: Kṛṣṇa consciousness can resolve economic and social problems by fostering satisfaction and reducing the endless pursuit of more money.

segments.key_quote: Let me utilize my valuable time of this human form of life in chanting Hare Kṛṣṇa.
segments.summary: Instead of focusing on improving economic policy, one should utilize their time in chanting Hare Kṛṣṇa for peace of mind and satisfaction.

segments.key_quote: Until the devotee is completely dependent upon me, I carry personally whatever he needs.
segments.summary: Saintly persons dedicated to Kṛṣṇa consciousness rely on Kṛṣṇa for their needs, exemplified by the story of Gīla Maṁgata, who received personal care from Kṛṣṇa.

segments.key_quote: The very, very, very basic principle of devotional service will make one happy.
segments.summary: Unhappiness arises from godless civilization and unnecessary competition, while God-consciousness and devotional service lead to satisfaction and happiness.
